additionalinformation: Son of George and Martha Thomas; brother of Charlie A. Thomas, of Wahnapitae.

gravereference: Naval and Mil. Plot. Sec. 1. Grave 511.
additionalinformation: Son of Arthur Edward and Ida May Thomas, of Toronto, husband of Elizabeth Thomas, of Toronto.
Son of David John and Mildred Thomas, of Whitby.
Son of Harry and Mary Thomas, of Mannville; husband of Louise Thomas, of Peace River.
Son of B. Eugenie Thomas, of Saskatoon.
Son of Edmund N. Thomas and Violet Grace Thomas, of Lower Sackville.
